name: sundance-mazda-project
description: Lighthouse Labs Final Project developed for the car dealership Sundance-Mazda to redesign their website.

scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.reset: psql -U mazda -d mazda < ./db/schema/create.sql && psql -U mazda -d mazda < ./db/seeds/vehicles.sql

author: Nahom Mehanzel & Amit Baid
